    Method
    Description
    static int
    addAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
    This method adds an appointment to the database and returns an int (generated key) that we can use to make an appointment object for the unique ID I don't know if it is needed or not to make an Appointment object, but I did it anyway
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments>
    appointmentsListByMonth()
    This method returns a list of appointments that are filtered for the current month
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments>
    appointmentsListByWeek()
    This method returns a list of appointments that are filtered for the current week
    static boolean
    checkForCustomerAppointment(int customerID)
    This method checks if there is an appointment for a specific customer ID to make sure that no customers are deleted before their appointments have been deleted first.
    static void
    deleteAppointment(int appointmentID)
    This method handles deleting an appointment from the database taking an appointment ID as an argument
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments>
    getAllAppointments()
    This method grabs an observable list of all of our appointments in the database
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments>
    getAllAppointmentsByContactID(int contactID)
    This method returns a list of appointments that correspond with a specific contact ID.
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<AppointmentsByTypeMonth>
    getAppointmentsByTypeMonth()
    This method returns a list of appointments that conform the AppointmentByTypeMonth class that I made specifically for the report screen This method selects the start month, type, and makes a count value, from the appointments table.
    static void
    updateAppointment(Appointments appointment)
    This method handles updating an appointment taking an appointment object as an argument

    • getAppointmentsByTypeMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<AppointmentsByTypeMonth> getAppointmentsByTypeMonth()
      This method returns a list of appointments that conform the AppointmentByTypeMonth class that I made specifically for the report screen This method selects the start month, type, and makes a count value, from the appointments table. Then it groups the results by the month and type so that we can have a list of AppointmentByTypeMonth Objects
      Returns:
